name: R Studio
details: R Studio is an IDE for R. R is a programming language for statistical computing and graphics. RStudio requires R 2.11.1 (or higher).

comments.comment: Here is a great resource for getting started: http://data.princeton.edu/R/gettingStarted.html.
This is a great app. I prefer Matlab for my work though.
Don't forget to install R! I did not read the instructions on the site and could not open R Studio after I installed it because I forgot to install R as well.
